title: Introduction to C Programming
description: Learn the fundamentals of C programming, including data types, control structures, and functions. Ideal for beginners aiming to build a solid programming foundation.

title: C Programming Beyond Basics
description: Deepen your C knowledge with pointers, memory management, file handling, and advanced programming techniques. Perfect for those who have mastered the basics.

title: Introduction to C++
description: Get started with C++, covering variables, control flow, and basic data structures. A beginner-friendly course for transitioning from C or starting fresh.

title: Object Oriented Programming with C++
description: Master OOP concepts like classes, inheritance, polymorphism, and encapsulation using C++. Essential for developing modular and scalable applications.

title: Introduction to React
description: Build dynamic web interfaces with React, one of the most popular JavaScript libraries. Learn components, hooks, props, and state management from scratch.

title: Introduction to Node.js
description: Explore backend development using Node.js. Understand asynchronous programming, modules, and how to build RESTful APIs using Express.

title: Complete Introduction to Web Development
description: A full-stack crash course covering HTML, CSS, JavaScript, frontend frameworks, and backend fundamentals. Everything you need to start building modern web apps.

title: Power Electronics Basics
description: Understand the core principles of power electronics, including rectifiers, inverters, and converters. Ideal for electrical and electronics engineering students.

title: Switch Mode Power Supplies
description: Learn the design and operation of SMPS circuits, including buck, boost, and buck-boost converters. A hands-on approach to efficient power conversion.

title: Circuit Analysis
description: Study the basics of electric circuit theory, including Ohm's Law, Kirchhoff’s Laws, and circuit theorems. Essential for anyone entering electrical engineering.

title: Analog Electronics
description: Dive into the world of analog components like diodes, transistors, and amplifiers. Learn how to design and analyze analog circuits with real-world applications.

title: Operational Amplifiers
description: Master the theory and application of op-amps in linear and non-linear circuits. Topics include inverting/non-inverting amplifiers, filters, and comparators.
